abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Abdul Aziz Mohd.
            Yaacob at the meeting of July 24, 2001 concerning the
            Country Assistance Strategy progress report, the Fourth
            Structural Adjustment Credit, and the Education for All
            Project for Guinea.
